data.title: Trail Blazers Raymond Felton Talks About His 30 Point Night Against The Mavericks
data.meta_description: Portland Trail Blazers Raymond Felton scored a season-high 26 points through three quarters and finished with a game-high 30 points and LaMarcus Aldridge hit the game-winning shot as time expired in overtime to give the Blazers a 99-97 win. Mavericks Dirk Nowitzki finished with a team-high 23 points and a game-high 14 rebounds, giving him his second straight double-double and his 10th of the season. Jason Terry, Brandan Wright and Rodrigue Beaubois combined for 41 points off the Mavericks' bench. Dallas' bench outscored Portland's bench 44-27 on the night.  Blazers LaMarcus Aldridge posted his team-high 13th double-double of the season with 25 points and a team-high 12 rebounds.
